sentences.english: After intensive struggle within myself, I chose the road of no return.
sentences.chinese: 经过激烈的思想斗争，我选择了破釜沉舟之路。

sentences.english: There is a kind of perseverance, called Kua.
sentences.chinese: 有一种勇气，叫破釜沉舟，背水一战。

sentences.english: Success cannot test his resolve in the way that failure can.
sentences.chinese: 成功不能像失败那样锻炼他破釜沉舟的决心。

sentences.english: Many wonder if the president has now decided to go down with the ship.
sentences.chinese: 许多人在想，这位总统是否已经决定破釜沉舟。

sentences.english: Their entry into the war made them cross the Rubicon and abandon isolationism forever.
sentences.chinese: 他们的参战使他们破釜沉舟永远弃绝孤立主义。

sentences.english: We have burnt our boats and decided to fight to the end.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经破釜沉舟，下决心奋战到底。

sentences.english: There is a kind of courage, called the Rubicon, bite.
sentences.chinese: 有一种勇气，叫破釜沉舟，背水一战。

sentences.english: Go out with the spirit "sink or swim", and a person will not sink.
sentences.chinese: 带着破釜沉舟的精神去闯，一个人就不会沉没。
